dataModel.title: >Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: project
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a project established to collect vegetation plot data.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a given project.
Project name as defined by the PI.

attribute.attNotes: Not sure what would show up here. Do we want a pick list so as to force convergence to some consistent set of terms?
attribute.attDefinition: Short description of the project including the purpose for doing the project.
